task_instruction: You are a dual armed household robot. You will receive a sequence of images in chronological order, illustrating the progression of a task you are currently executing, with the last image representing your current observation. You will also receive a text task description. Your task is to infer whether the task's goal has been achieved, based on the provided task description. Answer with 'yes' or 'no'.

As a dual-armed household robot, you will be shown a series of images in sequential order, each depicting a step in a task you are performing. The final image reflects your most recent observation during this task. Along with these images, you will receive a written description of the task. Based on this description, determine if the objective of the task has been successfully met. Simply answer with 'yes' or 'no'.

In your role as a household robot with two arms, you will view a set of images presented in chronological order. These images represent various stages of a task that you are in the process of completing, with the last image showing your latest action. Additionally, a text describing the task will be provided. Your job is to assess, according to this description, whether the task has been completed correctly. Respond with either 'yes' or 'no'.

You, as a robot equipped with dual arms for household tasks, will receive a sequence of images. These images are arranged in the order they occurred, demonstrating the progression of a task you are undertaking, with the final image being your current state in this task. Accompanied by these images, there will be a description of the task in text form. Your task is to analyze and decide if the goal of the task has been achieved, as per the description. Answer simply with 'yes' or 'no'.

As a dual-armed robot designed for household activities, you will be provided with a chronological sequence of images. Each image illustrates a stage of a task that you are executing, and the last image in this sequence represents your present situation in completing this task. You will also be given a textual description of what the task entails. Based on this description, you need to determine if the task has been fulfilled. Your response should be either 'yes' or 'no'.

You, functioning as a household robot with two arms, will observe a series of images displayed in the order they were taken. These images chronicle the steps of a task you are currently engaged in, with the last image depicting your most recent progress. There will also be a written explanation of the task. Your role is to evaluate if the task's objective has been reached, in line with the provided description. The answer you provide should be simply 'yes' or 'no'.
metadata.task_intro: Goal understanding: infer whether the goal is achived
